    @allure.story("上传文件")

    def test_upload(self,caseinfo):
        '''图片上传'''
        headers = YamlUtil().read_extract_yaml()
        url = caseinfo['request']['url']
        file = caseinfo['request']['file']
        method = caseinfo['request']['method']
    
        # 因为16位数随机的，每次都不一样
